name: Pics.io digital asset management for WordPress
author: Pics.io team

sections.description:
This plugin was created to help Pics.io users save time on switching between tabs when they want to make a post for their blog or website with several images that are stored in digital asset management software.

Features

  • Quick access to your Picsio library from a post editor
  • Powerful search by text or by filters like color, rating, or upload time
  • Ability to browse through the entire collections tree
  • Quick preview of an image by clicking on its thumbnail
  • Upload from Picsio to the Media Library and add an image to a post
  • Create galleries from several images

Support

If you have questions about the plugin, contact us at support@pics.io or via live chat. We reply 24 hours 5 days a week.
sections.installation:
There are two ways to install this plugin:

Install Pics.io digital asset management for WordPress FROM WITHIN WordPress

  1. Visit the plugins page within your dashboard and select ‘Add New’
  2. Search for ‘Picsio’
  3. Activate this plugin from your Plugins page
  4. Go to the editor and add a new image, choose “Media Library”, and navigate to the Picsio tab.

Install Pics.io digital asset management for WordPress MANUALLY

  1. Upload the zip archive with our plugin to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory, download the zip here
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Go to the editor and add a new image, choose “Media Library”, and navigate to the Picsio tab.
sections.faq:
Do I need to have a Pics.io account to use this plugin?

The plugin itself is 100% free to use. However, you need to have an active Pics.io subscription (or a free 7-day trial account
) to use digital asset management solutions. The individual PAYG plan starts at $18/mo.

What file types does this plugin support?

Our WordPress digital asset management plugin gives you access to all assets in your existing DAM library. Any importing limitations are explained by the image types that WordPress officially supports, mainly: .jpeg, .png, .gif, .ico, .webp

short_description: Insert images from your Pics.io Digital asset management to a post without leaving WP admin.

screenshots.caption: Log into your Pics.io account after installing WordPress DAM Plugin
Once logged in, you will see your DAM library collection tree
Before importing an image, you can open its preview for a full-scale image
WordPress DAM integration also gives you access to the advanced search filters straight from your WP editor
You can also order displayed assets by rating, upload time, file name, etc.
